query:

# Employee Data Synchronization: SuccessFactors to NAVEX SFTP Integration

## Table of Contents

- [Employee Data Synchronization: SuccessFactors to NAVEX SFTP Integration](#employee-data-synchronization-successfactors-to-navex-sftp-integration)
  - [Table of Contents](#table-of-contents)
  - [API Overview](#api-overview)
  - [Endpoints](#endpoints)
    - [SuccessFactors OData API](#successfactors-odata-api)
    - [NAVEX SFTP Endpoint](#navex-sftp-endpoint)
    - [Internal SFTP Archive Endpoint](#internal-sftp-archive-endpoint)
  - [Current Boomi Flow Logic](#current-boomi-flow-logic)
    - [Process Flow Overview](#process-flow-overview)
    - [Step-by-Step Flow Description](#step-by-step-flow-description)
      - [Step 1: Process Initialization](#step-1-process-initialization)
      - [Step 2: Data Extraction Phase](#step-2-data-extraction-phase)
      - [Step 3: Data Transformation Phase](#step-3-data-transformation-phase)
      - [Step 4: Output Generation](#step-4-output-generation)
      - [Step 5: Delivery and Notification](#step-5-delivery-and-notification)
  - [Boomi Transformations Explained](#boomi-transformations-explained)
    - [Canonical To Kafka Avro Mapping](#canonical-to-kafka-avro-mapping)
  - [SAP Integration Suite Implementation](#sap-integration-suite-implementation)
    - [Component Mapping](#component-mapping)
      - [Main Process Component Mapping](#main-process-component-mapping)
      - [Data Extraction Component Mapping](#data-extraction-component-mapping)
      - [Data Transformation Component Mapping](#data-transformation-component-mapping)
      - [Output Generation Component Mapping](#output-generation-component-mapping)
    - [Integration Flow Visualization](#integration-flow-visualization)
    - [Configuration Details](#configuration-details)
  - [Environment Configuration](#environment-configuration)
  - [API Reference](#api-reference)
    - [SuccessFactors Employee Data API](#successfactors-employee-

Generate a production-ready iFlow with proper:
1. Start and End events
2. Required adapters and connectors
3. Content modifiers and processing steps
4. Proper sequence flows
5. Error handling
6. SAP Integration Suite compliance
